text: Mayumi Tanaka (Born 1955 in Tokyo) Is a japanese actress and voice actress affiliated with Aoni Production. Her most known roles are Monkey D. Luffy in One Piece and Krillin in Dragon Ball. Her real name is Mayumi Abe. Category:1955 births Category:Actors from Tokyo Category:Japanese actors Category:Japanese voice actors Category:Living people Category:Dragon Ball
title: Mayumi Tanaka
